I know this is noob, but how do I get the subs to play with the movie??
I agree with Mitch123100; how do I play the subs WITH the movie? :(
To get the subtitles to play in the movie (using VLC media player): Right click > Video > Subtitles track > Select the .srt file from the folder with the movie in it.
